meanings: Transitive verb <프로그램 등을> 개조하다, 대폭 변경하다, 망가뜨리다 ((up)); 더럽히다; 엉망으로 만들다

vlive.korean: 손에 멍이 들었어요, 멍이 - 진짜? His fingers are bruised. - Really? 듣기 View video BTS : 꿀FM <지진정의 R.A.D.I.O 라디오> #중대발표

examples.korean: his bruised and bloodied nose 발음듣기 멍이 들고 피투성이가 된 그의 코 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: his bruised and bloodied nose 발음

examples.korean: She had slipped and badly bruised her face. 발음듣기 그녀는 미끄러져 얼굴에 심한 멍이 들었다[타박상을 입었다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had slipped and badly bruised her face. 발음

examples.korean: She emerged from the overturned car with only a few scrapes and bruises. 발음듣기 그녀는 몇 군데 긁히고 멍만 든[찰과상과 타박상만 입은] 채 전복된 그 차 밖으로 빠져나왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She emerged from the overturned car with only a few scrapes and bruises. 발음

examples.korean: to be covered in bruises 발음듣기 군데군데 멍이 들다[멍투성이이다] Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to be covered in bruises 발음

examples.korean: Her arm was a mass of bruises. 발음듣기 그녀의 팔은 멍투성이였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her arm was a mass of bruises. 발음
